title: New Female Beast Champion
body: Anybody else excited for the new champion? I'm surprised there has been no posts about her, besides one on the forums about some idiot complaining about anime.

replies.body:
Hey there Summoner,

Check out my latest thread. I'm almost certain who it is.

Regards,
lols =)
I had a look. Cool find!
thought it was cool breast champion v_v
Hope she is not our new overloaded kit overlord, since her kit is asking to be one.
Not allowed to name and shame :P
